author: Marshall Cohen and Curt Merrill, CNN
title: One nation, locked down: How two weeks changed America
description: President Donald Trump announced a 15-day plan on March 16 to "slow the spread" of the coronavirus pandemic that has turned the country upside down.
content:
By Marshall Cohen and Curt Merrill, CNN
Updated 6:56 AM ET, Sat March 28, 2020
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
